com.ooyala.android.configuration

Class FCCTVRatingConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.configuration.FCCTVRatingConfiguration

  • public class FCCTVRatingConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this when first setting up the OoyalaPlayer to control the layout and behavior of the TV Ratings stamp.
